text: People Die for Metal () is a 1919 Russian silent drama movie directed by Alexandre Volkoff.Люди гибнут за металлЛюди гибнут за металл (1919) It stars Zoya Karabanova, Iona Talanov, and Yuri Yurovsky. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1919 movies
title: People Die for Metal
